Room.Name: Open Sky
Room.ShortDescription: You have reached the northern gorge near Mount Aphinix. 70.n4.e0.s0.w0
Room.LongDescription: The northern cliffs are much too high for your steed to fly over, so you will have to avoid them. You can fly higher, however, if you want a better look at the sheer rock face coming down from the mountain. To the east it looks like the southern face of Mount Aphinix has a more steep slope to it. A long way to the west, there is a jutting shoulder of the high cliffs, and you will probably have to turn south.
